t.t-foreach: [o for o in current_template_id.lines if o.is_active and o.template_type != 'footer_text']

t.t-if: qc_line['template_type'] == 'create' and display_name in ['Input Data','Output Data'] and qc_line['is_create'] == '' and qc_line['show_button'] == 'show'
qc_line['template_type'] == 'adjust' and display_name in ['Input Data','Output Data'] and qc_line['is_create'] == 'readonly' and qc_line['show_button'] == 'show'

t.t-foreach: [o for o in current_template_id.lines if o.is_active]
